concept.title: Plug-in: sctype
concept.shortdesc: Description of the phonex sctype plug-in.

conbody.p:
The sctype plug-in matches the detected syllable constituent type of a phone. The expression given to the plug-in must be a list of syllable constituent types from the following list, separated by a , (comma.)
LeftAppendix or LA
Onset or O
Nucleus or N
Coda or C
RightAppendix or RA
Ambisyllabic or AB
OEHS
SyllableStress or SS
SyllableBoundary or SB
WordBoundary or WB
Unknown or UK All constituent types are case-insensitive. Constituent types can also be prefixed by a - (minus) to indicate the constituent type is not-allowed.
The sctype plug-in is the deafult plug-in for phonex. The means the plug-in name and surrounding (' and ') can be left out of the expression (i.e., {}:onset is the same as {}:sctype('onset').
